Trenton.Trentoniana:
The Trentoniana Local History and Genealogy Collection is the a library-based special collection of historic memorabilia in Trenton, New Jersey. Held by the Trenton Free Public Library Board of Trustees, the collection contains books, manuscripts, ephemera, visual and audio media, and artifacts, with particular focus on local history and genealogical materials.
Although the Trenton Public Library dates back to 1750, the current organization was founded in 1900.
